mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board ( nickname, password, title, contents, salt, created_datetime ) VALUES ( #{nickname}, #{password}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{salt}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_board as p JOIN (SELECT bno FROM tbl_board ORDER BY bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 10) AS t ON t.bno = p.bno;
SELECT count(*) from tbl_board where bno > 0
